title: Constructivist and Variation Theory-Based Elementary Science Instructional Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding Foundational Pedagogy and Science Education Theories
context.additional_context: A process linking theoretical foundations of elementary science education with practical design methods for pre-service teachers

learning_goals: Learners can explain principles of designing elementary science instruction based on constructivist learning theory
Learners can develop learning activities that emphasize core scientific concepts by applying variation theory
Learners can create blended instructional materials that connect diverse learning contexts
Learners can implement teaching strategies that promote conceptual discrimination among learners
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
